sub_title: Global Medical Leader in Health & Wellbeing at Work
summary: Experienced medical leader in driving a culture of health and performance across multiple international companies. Recognized executive strategist developing award-winning approaches to understand, address and improve wellbeing to unlock human potential and create shared value for the organizations, shareholders and society. Known for an unwavering commitment to champion and sustain a cultural paradigm shift within companies that elevates overall performance, reduces health care spends, boosts engagement and productivity. A business visionary and inspirational leader who seamlessly integrates analytical thinking with creative execution.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 3131, 'name': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE_MgdbaCMs4g/company-logo_400_400/0/1659342070311?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=FhVX06Y83hRk690i4qVU9FVIAiWpXWNDP-nsQwTF8I4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/heineken/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdã e Região', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "Spearheaded HEINEKEN's Global Health and Wellbeing Division, strategically positioning employee population health as a key business priority and fostering a culture of health and wellbeing across 80+ countries.

Pioneered innovative initiatives within the company's global health agenda, streamlining governance, revitalizing local efforts, and driving disruptive programs to instill a performance-oriented culture across 100 on-site clinics and a team of 500+ healthcare professionals.

Implemented updated occupational health policies, conducted health risk assessments, developed fit-to-work and travel medicine guidelines, devised evacuation plans, and established quality of care systems for remote locations.

Introduced HEI-LIFE 2.0, a comprehensive global health platform, aimed at elevating engagement and nurturing a culture of well-being among 90,000 employees worldwide.

Actively engaged in various health and humanitarian crisis committees, playing a vital role in tackling challenges such as the COVID-19 pandemic and Russia-Ukraine conflict.

Held responsibility for medical evacuations and emergency response plans, encompassing social and mental health support for over 2,000 expatriates in 60+ countries.", 'title': 'Global Head of Health & Wellbeing', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'São Paulo', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "Headed HEINEKEN's Corporate Health & Wellbeing Department in Brazil, overseeing operations in the company's second-largest business unit with over 13,000 employees.

Directed a multidisciplinary team of 50+ healthcare professionals, including doctors, nurses, psychologists, nutritionists, speech therapists, and rescuers, distributed across 13 health units nationwide.

Modernized the company's occupational health guidelines and work-related hazards and risk guidelines, implementing updates in more than 100 facilities throughout the country. This resulted in a substantial decrease in accidents and work-related illnesses.

Achieved a cost reduction of $3.5 million over a span of three years by implementing a range of impactful population health initiatives and enhancing health metrics.

Introduced HEINEKEN CUIDA, an acclaimed health and wellbeing program designed to support employees and ensure business continuity during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Earned multiple awards and bolstered HEINEKEN's reputation, establishing industry leadership in population health and wellbeing strategies and partnerships.", 'title': 'Senior Manager Corporate Health & Wellbeing', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 986359, 'name': 'Faculdade Santa Marcelina', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF7AylYQlv13w/company-logo_400_400/0/1533941976971?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=EJ3aF3itx9OcNOZomnBFHo9eVTN91Trj7CTBJO9i6pc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/faculdade-santa-marcelina/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo e Região, Brasil', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'FASM - Faculdade Santa Marcelina', 'description': 'Held key academic positions as a Professor in charge of the occupational health discipline at Santa Marcelina Medical Faculty and as a visiting professor at the esteemed University of São Paulo (USP).

Contributed as a co-author to books and guidelines that address the inclusion of people with disabilities in the workplace, sharing expertise and promoting inclusive practices.

Engaged as a lecturer at multiple medical congresses and scientific meetings, imparting knowledge and advancements in the field of occupational health to fellow professionals.', 'title': 'Professor of Medicine, Occupational Health', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 434631, 'name': 'Santander Brasil', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGmSjX7QsHEQA/company-logo_400_400/0/1687985768084?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=eHyyAVjjWrRzN-YdMwJasfOd-YXDFqkOol9QKrOU1AI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/grupo-santander-brasil/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo e Região, Brasil', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Santander Brasil', 'description': 'Held leadership position as the head of the Santander Health & Wellness Department in Brazil, devising a forward-thinking strategy centered around streamlined governance, enhanced health policies, and expanded initiatives focused on disease prevention and mental health. This initiative covered a workforce of more than 55,000 employees.

Successfully achieved a reduction of $18 million in health costs over a period of two years by spearheading an acclaimed integrated health program. This program targeted the reduction of absenteeism, the enhancement of capabilities, and the promotion of employee engagement.

Assembled a cross-functional executive team to drive improvements in productivity and mitigate long-term sick leave, resulting in a noteworthy reduction of over 20% as confirmed by the Human Resources Executive Dashboard in 2015.', 'title': 'Manager Health & Wellness', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 685433, 'name': 'Serasa Experian', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEVEWVqVIMung/company-logo_400_400/0/1650319092343?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Rl_OgOahOU29qpuu3Rm1-JtR_EpFEhApVvV7PMN58Ck', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/serasaexperian/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo e Região, Brasil', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Serasa Experian', 'description': "Oversaw a diverse team of 27 health specialists and executed the company's health strategy aimed at enhancing productivity and mitigating absenteeism.

Appointed as a key member of the Executive Team within the Entrepreneurial Inclusion Network, a prestigious consortium comprising leading companies such as Microsoft, Bayer, and UnitedHealth Group.", 'title': 'Healthcare & Occupational Health Lead', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 143424, 'name': 'Hospital Sírio-Libanês', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQErEP4ed610wA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519903134229?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=SHWrK47k2H_I9_vgU_jwsWbmCJcJxKw0858lSePcpwM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hospitalsiriolibanes/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo e Região, Brasil', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Hospital Sírio-Libanês', 'description': "Accountable for overseeing medical care and occupational health services at the hospital, effectively addressing intricate healthcare issues and providing optimal assistance to employees and the management team.
